title: Can Riot do better at banning actual toxic players?
body: Legit, Riot is so quick to ban hammer those who say naughty words, but I get no instant feedback, no nothing, when I report someone who AFK split pushes a lane in ranked all game after spamming "GG" in all chat.

replies.body: I mean, I feel like I can just mute or ignore anyone that says mean things, but griefing literally makes the game unplayable. Nobody really wants to surrender a ranked match, and even less want to surrender when someone is trolling because it gives them what they want. I've been playing since 2013. I've seen a lot of change over the years, but I feel like this problem has never actually been addressed.
Yes they could do better with trolls and griefers imo.
maybe they do, only the last person who sends the report in gets the message so you never know
